item.title: Simpler Regex Guide
item.description: Did you ever find yourself repeating keystrokes when editing a long list of words, for example you want to replace that semicolon ; with a colon : And you think there should be a cooler way to do that OR you know the way but you never remember the old fabled regex when needed. Here is a list of simple regex example that you can easily tweak to get things done faster.
